rule.descr: Port Forward HTTP (80/tcp) - From LAN -> FW Localhost Squid HTTP Port (3128/tcp)
Port Forward HTTPS (443/tcp) - From LAN -> FW Localhost Squid HTTPS Port (3129/tcp)
Port Forward HTTP (80/tcp) - From WAN -> DMZ_EXT_Server
Port Forward HTTPS (443/tcp) - From WAN -> DMZ_EXT_Server
Allow ICMP - From ANY to FW (For Testing Purposes)
NAT Port Forward HTTP (80/tcp) - From WAN -> DMZ_EXT_Server
NAT Port Forward HTTPS (443/tcp) - From WAN -> DMZ_EXT_Server
[Default] - Block ANY - From WAN -> ANY IPv4
[Default] - Block ANY - From WAN -> ANY IPv6
Port Forward HTTP (80/tcp) - From LAN -> FW Localhost Squid HTTP Port (3128/tcp)
Port Forward HTTPS (443/tcp) - From LAN -> FW Localhost Squid HTTP Port (3129/tcp)
[Default] - Block ANY - From LAN -> ANY IPv4
[Default] - Block ANY - From LAN -> ANY IPv6
Allow HTTP (80/tcp) - From DMZ_INT -> ANY (Excluding Local Subnets)
Allow HTTPS (443/tcp) - From DMZ_INT -> ANY (Excluding Local Subnets)
[Default] - Block ANY - From DMZ_INT -> ANY IPv4
[Default] - Block ANY - From DMZ_INT -> ANY IPv6
Allow HTTP (80/tcp) - From DMZ_EXT -> ANY (Excluding Local Subnets)
Allow HTTPS (443/tcp) - From DMZ_EXT -> ANY (Excluding Local Subnets)
[Default] - Block ANY - From DMZ_EXT -> ANY IPv4
[Default] - Block ANY - From DMZ_EXT -> ANY IPv6
[Default] - Block ANY - From VPN_WG -> ANY IPv4
[Default] - Block ANY - From VPN_WG -> ANY IPv6

revision.description: admin@10.0.10.201 (Local Database): Firewall: Rules - enabled a firewall rule.

package.name: squid3
package.descr: High performance web proxy cache (3.4 branch). It combines Squid as a proxy server with its capabilities of acting as a HTTP / HTTPS reverse proxy.<br /> It includes an Exchange-Web-Access (OWA) Assistant, SSL filtering and antivirus integration via C-ICAP.

package.name: suricata
package.descr: High Performance Network IDS, IPS and Security Monitoring engine by OISF.

package.name: WireGuard

menu.name: Squid Reverse Proxy
menu.tooltiptext: Modify the reverse proxy server settings

service.name: c-icap
service.description: ICAP Interface for Squid and ClamAV integration
